concept.title: Audit guarantee
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server provides a guarantee for generated audit records.

conbody.p: The guarantee for audit records and their content and integrity is based on these factors:

ul.li: Audit records stored as JSON files are asynchronous by default.
Couchbase Server provides audit logs that are tamper-resistant recordings of how the system was used.

Only a Couchbase process can write an audit record. Therefore, even the root Couchbase administrator is unable to generate an audit record: if an administrator made a change in an existing audit record, such action would be captured in the system log.
